Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury (Vet.) -- Disabled Vets. Homestead Exemp. - PJ
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Disabled Veterans Homestead Exemption)

Summary:  Authorizes an additional homestead exemption in Morehouse Parish, Louisiana, effective on and after January 1, 2012, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution.
Race.FullText: Shall an additional homestead exemption be authorized in Morehouse Parish, Louisiana, effective on and after January 1, 2012, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution, provided that this additional homestead exemption shall extend and apply to property in Morehouse Parish only after approval by a majority of the registered voters of Morehouse Parish voting on this proposition?
